Belgium: Pepin of Herstal and his wife Plectrude found what will become the Abbey of Saint-Hubert.
Germany: Battle of Tertry: Austrasian forces loyal to Pepin of Herstal defeated the invading army of Theuderic III at modern Tertry, Somme. Pepin of Herstal accepted Theuderic's unification of the Frankish kingdoms on the condition that he replace Berchar as his mayor of the palace. Pepin of Herstal took the title Duke of the Franks.
Indinesia: I-tsing returned to Srivijaya in on his way back from India to China. In his record he reported that the kingdom of Malayu was captured by Srivijaya.
